Table.name: NN_FNNCL_ASST
Table.commentInRDBMS: A Non-financial asset is an Asset that is not a Financial asset.

Column.name: NN_FNNCL_ASST_NN_FNNCL_LBLTY_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between non-financial assets and non-financial liabilities.

Column.name: CRRYNG_AMNT
Column.comment: The carrying amount in accordance with Annex V to Implementing Regulation (EU) No 680/2014.

Column.name: NN_FNNCL_ASST_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between different types of non-financial assets. For example intangible assets, tax assets.

Column.name: OTHR_NN_FNNCL_ASST_RFRNC_DT
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: OTHR_NN_FNNCL_ASST_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: HLD_SL_INDCTR7
Column.comment: Held for sale indicates the Non-current assets and instruments in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS5. Is not applicable under national GAAP based on BAD.

Column.name: OTHR_NN_FNNCL_ASST_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between non-financial assets that have been and that have not been taken into possession.

Column.name: GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT3
Column.comment: Gross carrying amount is an amount,that is the gross carrying amount of the Propperty, plant and equipment taken into possession.

Column.name: GCA_EXPSR_DRCGNSD_EXCHNG_CLLTRL3
Column.comment: Derecognised exposure gross carrying amount is an amount, that is the gross carrying amount of exposures that are derecognised on the balance sheet in exchange for Property, plant and equipment taken possession.

Column.name: ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT3
Column.comment:
Accumulated impairment is the amount of loss allowances that are held against or are allocated to the derecognised exposure on the reporting reference date for which the Property, plant and equipment taken into possession has been obtained.
This data attribute applies to assets subject to impairment under the applied accounting standard. Under IFRS, the accumulated impairment relates to the following amounts: (i) loss allowance at an amount equal to 12-month expected credit losses; (ii) loss allowance at an amount equal to lifetime expected credit losses. Under GAAP, the accumulated impairment relates to the following amounts: (i) loss allowance at an amount equal to general allowances; (ii) loss allowance at an amount equal to specific allowances.

Column.name: ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR1
Column.comment:
Accumulated changes in fair value due to credit risk in accordance with Part 2.46 of Annex V to Implementing Regulation (EU) No 680/2014 of the exposure that is derecognised because of the Property, plant and equipment taken into possession.
Note: This amount must only be reported when it is negative.

Column.name: ACCMLTD_CHNG_NGTV3
Column.comment: Accumulated negative changes shall be the difference, at the level of the individual collateral item, between the value at initial recognition of the collateral and the carrying amount at the reporting reference date, where that difference is negative. (FINREP Annex V)

Column.name: GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT2
Column.comment: Gross carrying amount is an amount,that is the gross carrying amount of the Propperty, plant and equipment taken into possession.

Column.name: GCA_EXPSR_DRCGNSD_EXCHNG_CLLTRL2
Column.comment: Derecognised exposure gross carrying amount is an amount, that is the gross carrying amount of exposures that are derecognised on the balance sheet in exchange for Property, plant and equipment taken possession.

Column.name: ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT2
Column.comment:
Accumulated impairment is the amount of loss allowances that are held against or are allocated to the derecognised exposure on the reporting reference date for which the Property, plant and equipment taken into possession has been obtained.
This data attribute applies to assets subject to impairment under the applied accounting standard. Under IFRS, the accumulated impairment relates to the following amounts: (i) loss allowance at an amount equal to 12-month expected credit losses; (ii) loss allowance at an amount equal to lifetime expected credit losses. Under GAAP, the accumulated impairment relates to the following amounts: (i) loss allowance at an amount equal to general allowances; (ii) loss allowance at an amount equal to specific allowances.

Column.name: ACCMLTD_CHNG_NGTV2
Column.comment: Accumulated negative changes shall be the difference, at the level of the individual collateral item, between the value at initial recognition of the collateral and the carrying amount at the reporting reference date, where that difference is negative. (FINREP Annex V)

Column.name: OTHR_INTNGBL_ASST_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between intangible assets that have and that have not been taken into possession.

Column.name: OTHR_INTNGBL_ASST_TKN_INT_PSSSSN_RFRNC_DT
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: OTHR_INTNGBL_ASST_TKN_INT_PSSSSN_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: SBJCT_OPRTNG_LS_INDCTR4
Column.comment: An indicator to specify if an object is subject to operating lease or not.

Column.name: HLD_SL_INDCTR6
Column.comment: Held for sale indicates the Non-current assets and instruments in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS5. Is not applicable under national GAAP based on BAD.

Column.name: MSRMNT_MTHD4
Column.comment: Measurement method identifies the type of measurement method according to IAS (See IAS 16.30, 16.31 and IAS 40.33-55, 76). It distinguishes into their cost or revaluation model.

Column.name: TM_SNC_INTL_RCGNTN2
Column.comment: Time elapsed since initial recognition band classifies time elapsed since initial recognition in the balance sheet into bands used for FINREP reporting.

Column.name: SFTWR_ASSTS_INDCTR1
Column.comment: Software asset indicator indicates whether the reported asset is a software asset or not.

Column.name: OTHR_INTNGBL_ASST_TKN_INT_PSSSSN_TYP
Column.comment: Other intangible asset taken into possession type distinguishes other intangible asset between those taken into possession during the reporting period and those taken into possession before the reporting period.

Column.name: GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT1
Column.comment: Gross carrying amount is an amount,that is the gross carrying amount of the Propperty, plant and equipment taken into possession.

Column.name: GCA_EXPSR_DRCGNSD_EXCHNG_CLLTRL1
Column.comment: Derecognised exposure gross carrying amount is an amount, that is the gross carrying amount of exposures that are derecognised on the balance sheet in exchange for Property, plant and equipment taken possession.

Column.name: ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT1
Column.comment:
Accumulated impairment is the amount of loss allowances that are held against or are allocated to the derecognised exposure on the reporting reference date for which the Property, plant and equipment taken into possession has been obtained.
This data attribute applies to assets subject to impairment under the applied accounting standard. Under IFRS, the accumulated impairment relates to the following amounts: (i) loss allowance at an amount equal to 12-month expected credit losses; (ii) loss allowance at an amount equal to lifetime expected credit losses. Under GAAP, the accumulated impairment relates to the following amounts: (i) loss allowance at an amount equal to general allowances; (ii) loss allowance at an amount equal to specific allowances.

Column.comment: Accumulated negative changes shall be the difference, at the level of the individual collateral item, between the value at initial recognition of the collateral and the carrying amount at the reporting reference date, where that difference is negative. (FINREP Annex V)

Column.name: OTHR_INTNGBL_ASST_NT_TKN_INT_PSSSSN_RFRNC_DT
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: OTHR_INTNGBL_ASST_NT_TKN_INT_PSSSSN_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: SBJCT_OPRTNG_LS_INDCTR3
Column.comment: An indicator to specify if an object is subject to operating lease or not.

Column.comment: Held for sale indicates the Non-current assets and instruments in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS5. Is not applicable under national GAAP based on BAD.

Column.comment: Measurement method identifies the type of measurement method according to IAS (See IAS 16.30, 16.31 and IAS 40.33-55, 76). It distinguishes into their cost or revaluation model.

Column.name: SFTWR_ASSTS_INDCTR
Column.comment: Software asset indicator indicates whether the reported asset is a software asset or not.

Column.name: TM_SNC_INTL_RCGNTN1
Column.comment: Time elapsed since initial recognition band classifies time elapsed since initial recognition in the balance sheet into bands used for FINREP reporting.

Column.name: RFRNC_DT
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: RPRTNG_AGNT_ID
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: HLD_SL_INDCTR4
Column.comment: Held for sale indicates the Non-current assets and instruments in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS5. Is not applicable under national GAAP based on BAD.

Column.comment: Measurement method identifies the type of measurement method according to IAS (See IAS 16.30, 16.31 and IAS 40.33-55, 76). It distinguishes into their cost or revaluation model.

Column.name: SBJCT_OPRTNG_LS_INDCTR2
Column.comment: An indicator to specify if an object is subject to operating lease or not.

Column.name: TX_ASST_RFRNC_DT
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: TX_ASST_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: TS_ASST_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between current and deferred tax assets.

Column.name: HLD_SL_INDCTR3
Column.comment: Indicates the Non-current assets and instruments in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS5. Is not applicable under national GAAP based on BAD.

Column.name: PRPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT_TYP
Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between property, plant and equipment that has been and that has not been taken into possession.

Column.name: PPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT_TKN_INT_PSSSSN_RFRNC_DT
Column.comment: The date the data refers to.

Column.name: PPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT_TKN_INT_PSSSSN_RPRTNG_AGNT_ID
Column.comment: Identifier of the reporting agent.

Column.name: HLD_SL_INDCTR2
Column.comment: Held for sale indicates the Non-current assets and instruments in disposal groups classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS5. Is not applicable under national GAAP based on BAD.

Column.comment: Measurement method identifies the type of measurement method according to IAS (See IAS 16.30, 16.31 and IAS 40.33-55, 76). It distinguishes into their cost or revaluation model.

Column.name: SBJCT_OPRTNG_LS_INDCTR1
Column.comment: An indicator to specify if an object is subject to operating lease or not.

Column.name: TM_SNC_INTL_RCGNTN
Column.comment: Time elapsed since initial recognition band classifies time elapsed since initial recognition in the balance sheet into bands used for FINREP reporting.

Column.comment: A discriminator to distinguish between property, plant and equipment taken into possession during and before the reporting period.
